release.action: New version to be included in ePlatform 3.1 Release.
JSF UIComponents are now supported inside Builder pages just like older style idegaWeb Block and Element components.
Experimental support for storing Builder Pages as version controlled documents in the Slide WebDAV repository.
Performance optimizations and caching when dealing with database access on reload of Builder application and pages.
Builder Page structure is now initialized when first going into the Builder.
IBXML Document format slightly changed to use UUID's as id attributes to be more portable.
Caching updated to use newer IWCacheManager2
